Plot
A bottle containing a plea for help arrives at the Rescue Aid Society, 
an organization of mice from all over the world who&#039;s mission is to 
help those in need. Bernard and Miss Bianca are chosen for the task and 
after gathering the needed clues and information, they fly on the back 
of albatross Orville to the gloomy and uncharted Devil&#039;s Beyou. There, 
together with Ellie Mae and other swamp folk, they must work together 
to save a little orphan girl from the evil Madame Medusa.
